description: Gets the details of a rule in Amazon DataZone. A rule is a formal agreement that enforces specific requirements across user workflows (e.g., publishing assets to the catalog, requesting subscriptions, creating projects) within the Amazon DataZone data portal. These rules help maintain consistency, ensure compliance, and uphold governance standards in data management processes. For instance, a metadata enforcement rule can specify the required information for creating a subscription request or publishing a data asset to the catalog, ensuring alignment with organizational standards.

parameters.name: domainIdentifier
parameters.description: The ID of the domain where the GetRule action is to be invoked.

nested_items.name: action
nested_items.description: The action of the rule.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the rule was created.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The user who created the rule.

nested_items.name: description
nested_items.description: The description of the rule.

nested_items.name: metadataFormEnforcementDetail
nested_items.description: The enforcement detail of the metadata form.

nested_items.name: requiredMetadataForms
nested_items.description: The required metadata forms.

nested_items.name: typeIdentifier
nested_items.description: The type ID of the metadata form reference.

nested_items.name: typeRevision
nested_items.description: The type revision of the metadata form reference.

nested_items.name: identifier
nested_items.description: The ID of the rule.

nested_items.name: lastUpdatedBy
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the rule was last updated.

nested_items.name: name
nested_items.description: The name of the rule.

nested_items.name: revision
nested_items.description: The revision of the rule.

nested_items.name: ruleType
nested_items.description: The type of the rule.

nested_items.name: assetType
nested_items.description: The asset type included in the rule scope.

nested_items.name: selectionMode
nested_items.description: The selection mode for the rule.

nested_items.name: specificAssetTypes
nested_items.description: The specific asset types that are included in the rule.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: dataProduct
nested_items.description: The data product included in the rule scope.

nested_items.name: selectionMode
nested_items.description: The selection mode of the rule.

nested_items.name: specificProjects
nested_items.description: The specific projects in which the rule is created.
(string) ---

nested_items.name: domainUnitTarget
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: domainUnitId
nested_items.description: The ID of the domain unit.

nested_items.name: includeChildDomainUnits
nested_items.description: Specifies whether to apply a rule to the child domain units.

nested_items.name: targetType
nested_items.description: The target type of the rule.

nested_items.name: updatedAt
nested_items.description: The timestamp at which the rule was last updated.
